Summary: Saw a faint light moving rapidly across the sky to small for both an airplane or helicopter.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving North on I-95 right around the Savanah, Georgia Airport. I saw a faint light moving across the sky over the highway in the distance out of the corner of my eye. At first I thought it was a satellite but it was moving quite rapidly. It made its way across the highway and then came to a complete stop for a few seconds and then went in the opposite direction just as fast as the first time and then came to another complete stop and hovered there until I drove past and couldn't see it anymore. I thought at first it could be an airplane but what type of an airplane comes to a complete stop in midair and sits there. Then I thought maybe it was a helicopter but it was flying at a very high altitude and quit fast for a helicopter and a helicopter usually flys lower to the ground and you can usually tell its a helicopter by the brighter solid light and slower speed.
